argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmsub.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsubrg | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldsub | |- - = ( -g ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s K ) = ( CCfld |`s K ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) = ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_subgsub | |- ( ( K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ A e. K /\ B e. K ) -> ( A - B ) = ( A ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) B ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K /\ B e. K ) -> ( A - B ) = ( A ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) B ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsca | |- ( W e. CMod -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( -g ` F ) = ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K /\ B e. K ) -> ( -g ` F ) = ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K /\ B e. K ) -> ( A ( -g ` F ) B ) = ( A ( -g ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) B ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K /\ B e. K ) -> ( A - B ) = ( A ( -g ` F ) B ) ) |
